synopsis.text: Mashimaâ€”a professional consultant who seems to express a strong disinterest in women. But when Mio challenges him, Shuuji invites her to a hotel room, leading to an unexpected and satisfying encounter. Both having been deprived of intimacy for years, they embark on a journey to rediscover their lost desires. As they explore their newfound connection, they may uncover that the person they yearn for is closer than they think. This anime presents two versions: a TV-friendly adaptation and an explicit online counterpart.
